reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA**/ Velocity

 **% Used**/ 4

**Coil**/ Clapton **W**/ 45 

**Steep Time**/2 weeks **Wicking**/ Full      

**PG/VG** 50/50 **Nic%** 0    

**Mouth Feel** - Light on the tongue slightly sticky mouth, feel and very light on the nose. Moderately dense I give it a 4 out of 10. No throat hit.                                             

**Flavor Properties**- Sweet syrup like chocolate light with none of the creaminess  that I've been getting from other chocolates. On the upside no chalky flavor this is a bittersweet chocolate with the emphasis on sweet.

**Relatable Flavors** - Taste like something I would use if I was trying to make a chocolate sucker or Jolly Rancher.

**Off Flavors** - I've already hit this 3 times and maybe it's intentional,syrupy flavor almost cough medicine like, ( without it being really gross )and a         lingering aftertaste.

**Position In The Recipe** - Moderately dense leaves me to believe this is going to best serve other chocolates as an accent. ( hopefully helping get rid of that chalky mouthfeel flavor )       

**Pairings** - Other chocolate, creams, bakeries, tobacco's, dark berries, and a few fruits like apple. ( I'm curious to try it with a little  fa cantaloupe )
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: OMFG It's Chocolate
